pages.text: $(d)Ender Letters$() allow you to $(3)send items to other players$() easily.$(br2)Use the Letter to open it. You can insert $(3)up to 9 items$() to send, and type the recipient's username in the text box.
pages.title: Ender Letter

pages.text: To send the letter, simply use it on an $(l:blocks/ender_mailbox)Ender Mailbox$(/l). The Letter will be inserted into the recipient's mailbox, if it has room.
